content: yarn is in position in first space of next shell ** repeat from * to ** around join with slip_stitch to beg single_crochet 8 shells with 3 picot points on ea shell fasten_off and weave in tails hanger attach gold at center back seam inside top of stocking chain 15 slip_stitch back in joining to create loop then slip_stitch in ea chain of loop join to point where yarn was first attached fasten_off and weave in tails securely eyelash trim note it may be helpful to fold stocking along unused loop lines to make it easier to see where to attach the eyelash trim with eyelash yarn and size g hook working in unused loops of half_double_crochet on round 1 attach eyelash yarn to center back seam st chain 1 single_crochet in same st *chain 3 single_crochet in next unused loop repeat from * around join with slip_stitch fasten_off repeat on unused loops of rnds 3 and 5 weave in tails finishing block stocking by laying it flat between damp towels allow to dry bell & ribbon trim with 12 lengths of 1/8 ribbon tie one small jingle bell to center of each shell at top of stocking and to inside corner point of heel on front and back tie the large bell to tip of toe weave three 1-yd lengths of ¼ 2 burgundy 1 black through last half_double_crochet round below eyelash trim section and tie in a bow on front of stocking copyright 2017 2015 2007 kathy north www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes 4
